::Orchestra::

       Orchestra grinned as he saw this transformer arrive.

        "Thank you," He said in reply to the bravo.

         He then sighed.

        "Do you think I could join you?  Please, I beg of you to let me join
you!  I promise I will play my music in any way you desire!!" He pleeded.
